missing: Tell the story about a ferocious dragon who lived near a village. He would sneak into the village at night and steal people’s treasures – anything they loved.  Anybody who tried to take their treasure back would be eaten alive.  This continued for many years until the dragon became old, fat, and blind from sitting on his treasure and gazing at the glare of the gold coins. Then the townspeople could try and sneak into his lair and steal back their relatives’ treasure.
best-match: Tell the story about a ferocious Kapre who lived near a village. He would sneak into the village at night and steal people’s treasures – anything they loved.  Anybody who tried to take their treasure back would be eaten alive. This continued for many years until the Kapre became old, fat, and blind from sitting on his treasure and gazing at the glare of the gold coins. Then the townspeople could try and sneak into his lair and steal back their relatives’ treasure.
transl: Ikuwento ang tungkol sa galit na galit na kapre na nanirahan malapit sa nayon. Lumalabas sya nang palihim sa gabi mula sa nayon at magnakaw ng kayamanan ng mga tao– anumang bagay na gusto nila. Ang simunang sumubok na bawiin ang kanilang mga kayamanan, ay kakainin ng buhay. Ito ay patuloy na nangyayari sa madaming taon hanggat ang kapre ay tumanda na, tumaba at nabulag sa pagkaupo sa kanyang kayamanan at nakatitig sa nakakasilaw na liwanag ng mga baryang ginto . Ang mga taong bayan sumubok magnakaw sa kanyang pugad at bawiin ang mga kayamanan ng kanilang mga kamag-anak.
